___type.description: Type of instruction set used for the experiment, QASM or PULSE

___config.description: Configuration options that apply to all experiments in this qobj. For options that may be set on a per-experiment basis, these are the defaults.
___config.title: Qobj-level configuration

___memory_slots.description: The number of (slow) measurement slots requested on the backend, equivalent to the max of memory_slot requested by individual experiments.

___n_qubits.description: The number of qubits requested on the backend, equivalent to the max of n_qubits requested by individual experiments.

___shots.description: Number of repetitions of each experiment

___header.description: QObj metadata that does not affect how the experiments are run on the backend. Carried through to the result.

___backend_version.description: The backend version this set of experiments was generated for.

___backend_name.description: The backend this set of experiments was generated for. It may also be able to execute on other backends.

___schema_version.description: Schema version used to compile the qobj

___config.description: Configuration options that apply to specific experiments in this qobj. Overwrites qobj level configuration.
___config.title: Experiment level configuration

___memory_slots.description: Total number of (slow) measurement slots used in this experiment.

___n_qubits.description: Total number of qubits used in this experiment.

___header.description: Experiment metadata that does not affect how the experiment is run on the backend. Carried through to the result.

___memory_slots.description: Total number of (slow) measurement slots used in this experiment.

___n_qubits.description: Total number of qubits used in this experiment.

___qubit_labels.description: A list of length total physical qubits (from backend.configuration), where each element is either [qreg_name, n] to identify the corresponding physical qubit as the n-th qubit of qreg qreg_name, or null to identify that the corresponding physical qubit has no corresponding qreg
___qubit_labels.title: Map physical qubits to qregs (for QASM)

items.description: The qubit index within the qreg
items.title: qubit index

___clbit_labels.description: A list of length memory_slots, where each element is [creg_name, n] to identify the corresponding memory slot as the n-th element of creg creg_name.
___clbit_labels.title: Map physical clbits to register_slots (for QASM)

___creg_sizes.description: A list of [creg_name, size], to identify the QASM classical registers and their size, where the most significant register appears first, and the least significant register last.
___creg_sizes.title: List of classical registers and their sizes.

___qreg_sizes.description: A list of [qreg_name, size], to identify the QASM quantum registers and their size, where the most significant register appears first, and the least significant register last.
___qreg_sizes.title: List of quantum registers and their sizes.

_constraints: sum(x[1] for x in qreg_sizes) == n_qubits
sum(x[1] for x in creg_sizes) == memory_slots

___meas_return.description: Return each shot of data or average over the shots
